constituent: broaden, finger, fingers, wide, cave, elbow
heisigStory: Fingers . . . wide. The connection with the previous character is very close. Beware.
koohiiStory1: Japanese girls are tight and may require fingers inserted to broaden them and make them wide enough before you can...
koohiiStory2: Spread your fingers wide to broaden your hand.
kunYomi: ひろ.がる、ひろ.げる、ひろ.める
words:
拡散(かくさん): scattering, diffusion
拡充(かくじゅう): expansion
拡大(かくだい): magnification, enlargement
拡張(かくちょう): expansion, extension, enlargement, escape
